# openapi-client

Search API
- API version: 1.0.0

Use the Search REST API  to manage your data (indices and records), implement search, and improve relevance (with Rules, synonyms, and language dictionaries).

Although Algolia provides a REST API, you should use the official open source API [clients, libraries, and tools](https://www.algolia.com/doc/guides/getting-started/how-algolia-works/in-depth/ecosystem/) instead.
There's no [SLA](https://www.algolia.com/policies/sla/) if you use the REST API directly.


*Automatically generated by the [OpenAPI Generator](https://openapi-generator.tech)*

## Requirements

Building the API client library requires:
1. Java 1.7+
2. Maven/Gradle/SBT

## Installation

To install the API client library to your local Maven repository, simply execute:

```shell
mvn clean install
```

To deploy it to a remote Maven repository instead, configure the settings of the repository and execute:

```shell
mvn clean deploy
```

Refer to the [OSSRH Guide](http://central.sonatype.org/pages/ossrh-guide.html) for more information.

### Maven users

Add this dependency to your project's POM:

```xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.openapitools</groupId>
  <artifactId>openapi-client</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0</version>
  <scope>compile</scope>
</dependency>
```

### Gradle users

Add this dependency to your project's build file:

```groovy
compile "org.openapitools:openapi-client:1.0.0"
```

### SBT users

```scala
libraryDependencies += "org.openapitools" % "openapi-client" % "1.0.0"
```

## Getting Started

All URIs are relative to *https://myAppId.algolia.net*

Class | Method | HTTP request | Description
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
*SearchClient* | **addApiKey** | **POST** /1/keys | Add API key.
*SearchClient* | **addOrUpdateObject** | **PUT** /1/indexes/${indexName}/${objectID} | Add or update a record (using objectID).
*SearchClient* | **appendSource** | **POST** /1/security/sources/append | Add a source.
*SearchClient* | **assignUserId** | **POST** /1/clusters/mapping | Assign or move a user ID.
*SearchClient* | **batch** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/batch | Batch write operations on one index.
*SearchClient* | **batchAssignUserIds** | **POST** /1/clusters/mapping/batch | Batch assign userIDs.
*SearchClient* | **batchDictionaryEntries** | **POST** /1/dictionaries/${dictionaryName}/batch | Batch dictionary entries.
*SearchClient* | **browse** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/browse | Get all records from an index.
*SearchClient* | **clearAllSynonyms** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/synonyms/clear | Delete all synonyms.
*SearchClient* | **clearObjects** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/clear | Delete all records from an index.
*SearchClient* | **clearRules** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/rules/clear | Delete all rules.
*SearchClient* | **del** | **DELETE** /1${path} | Send requests to the Algolia REST API.
*SearchClient* | **deleteApiKey** | **DELETE** /1/keys/${key} | Delete API key.
*SearchClient* | **deleteBy** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/deleteByQuery | Delete all records matching a query.
*SearchClient* | **deleteIndex** | **DELETE** /1/indexes/${indexName} | Delete index.
*SearchClient* | **deleteObject** | **DELETE** /1/indexes/${indexName}/${objectID} | Delete a record.
*SearchClient* | **deleteRule** | **DELETE** /1/indexes/${indexName}/rules/${objectID} | Delete a rule.
*SearchClient* | **deleteSource** | **DELETE** /1/security/sources/${source} | Remove a source.
*SearchClient* | **deleteSynonym** | **DELETE** /1/indexes/${indexName}/synonyms/${objectID} | Delete a synonym.
*SearchClient* | **get** | **GET** /1${path} | Send requests to the Algolia REST API.
*SearchClient* | **getApiKey** | **GET** /1/keys/${key} | Get API key permissions.
*SearchClient* | **getDictionaryLanguages** | **GET** /1/dictionaries/_*_/languages | List available languages.
*SearchClient* | **getDictionarySettings** | **GET** /1/dictionaries/_*_/settings | Get stop word settings.
*SearchClient* | **getLogs** | **GET** /1/logs | Return the latest log entries.
*SearchClient* | **getObject** | **GET** /1/indexes/${indexName}/${objectID} | Get a record.
*SearchClient* | **getObjects** | **POST** /1/indexes/_*_/objects | Get multiple records.
*SearchClient* | **getRule** | **GET** /1/indexes/${indexName}/rules/${objectID} | Get a rule.
*SearchClient* | **getSettings** | **GET** /1/indexes/${indexName}/settings | Get index settings.
*SearchClient* | **getSources** | **GET** /1/security/sources | Get all allowed IP addresses.
*SearchClient* | **getSynonym** | **GET** /1/indexes/${indexName}/synonyms/${objectID} | Get a synonym object.
*SearchClient* | **getTask** | **GET** /1/indexes/${indexName}/task/${taskID} | Check a task&#39;s status.
*SearchClient* | **getTopUserIds** | **GET** /1/clusters/mapping/top | Get top userID.
*SearchClient* | **getUserId** | **GET** /1/clusters/mapping/${userID} | Get userID.
*SearchClient* | **hasPendingMappings** | **GET** /1/clusters/mapping/pending | Get migration and user mapping status.
*SearchClient* | **listApiKeys** | **GET** /1/keys | List API keys.
*SearchClient* | **listClusters** | **GET** /1/clusters | List clusters.
*SearchClient* | **listIndices** | **GET** /1/indexes | List indices.
*SearchClient* | **listUserIds** | **GET** /1/clusters/mapping | List userIDs.
*SearchClient* | **multipleBatch** | **POST** /1/indexes/_*_/batch | Batch write operations on multiple indices.
*SearchClient* | **operationIndex** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/operation | Copy, move, or rename an index.
*SearchClient* | **partialUpdateObject** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/${objectID}/partial | Update record attributes.
*SearchClient* | **post** | **POST** /1${path} | Send requests to the Algolia REST API.
*SearchClient* | **put** | **PUT** /1${path} | Send requests to the Algolia REST API.
*SearchClient* | **removeUserId** | **DELETE** /1/clusters/mapping/${userID} | Remove userID.
*SearchClient* | **replaceSources** | **PUT** /1/security/sources | Replace all sources.
*SearchClient* | **restoreApiKey** | **POST** /1/keys/${key}/restore | Restore API key.
*SearchClient* | **saveObject** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName} | Add or update a record.
*SearchClient* | **saveRule** | **PUT** /1/indexes/${indexName}/rules/${objectID} | Create or update a rule.
*SearchClient* | **saveRules** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/rules/batch | Save a batch of rules.
*SearchClient* | **saveSynonym** | **PUT** /1/indexes/${indexName}/synonyms/${objectID} | Save a synonym.
*SearchClient* | **saveSynonyms** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/synonyms/batch | Save a batch of synonyms.
*SearchClient* | **search** | **POST** /1/indexes/_*_/queries | Search multiple indices.
*SearchClient* | **searchDictionaryEntries** | **POST** /1/dictionaries/${dictionaryName}/search | Search dictionary entries.
*SearchClient* | **searchForFacetValues** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/facets/${facetName}/query | Search for facet values.
*SearchClient* | **searchRules** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/rules/search | Search for rules.
*SearchClient* | **searchSingleIndex** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/query | Search an index.
*SearchClient* | **searchSynonyms** | **POST** /1/indexes/${indexName}/synonyms/search | Search for synonyms.
*SearchClient* | **searchUserIds** | **POST** /1/clusters/mapping/search | Search for a user ID.
*SearchClient* | **setDictionarySettings** | **PUT** /1/dictionaries/_*_/settings | Set stop word settings.
*SearchClient* | **setSettings** | **PUT** /1/indexes/${indexName}/settings | Update index settings.
*SearchClient* | **updateApiKey** | **PUT** /1/keys/${key} | Update an API key.

<a id="documentation-for-authorization"></a>
## Documentation for Authorization


Authentication schemes defined for the API:
<a id="appId"></a>
### appId

- **Type**: API key
- **API key parameter name**: X-Algolia-Application-Id
- **Location**: HTTP header

<a id="apiKey"></a>
### apiKey

- **Type**: API key
- **API key parameter name**: X-Algolia-API-Key
- **Location**: HTTP header
